Please do not forward or share this e-ma: Please do not forward or share this e-mail: each tip-off allows a limited number of accesses and downloads before being destroyed forever and nobody (even the node administrator) can recover an expired or dead tip-off.

There are three types of users inside of: There are three types of users inside of GlobaLeaks: the administrator, the receivers and the whistleblower. Your username for accessing the node as the administrator will be 'admin'.
These are the thresholds that are used t: These are the thresholds that are used to identify anomalous behaviour:
They would like you to pay special atten: They would like you to pay special attention to the information and material contained therein. Please keep in mind that whistleblowers often expose themselves to high personal risks for the public interest. Therefore the material that they provide with this tip-off should be considered of high importance.
This could be the sign of an attack or j: This could be the sign of an attack or just a spike in usage due to the increased visibility of your initiative.

This interface may help you spot anomali: Esta interface poderá ajudá-lo a detetar as anomalias no seu Nodo.
This interface may help you understand h: This interface may help you understand how the Node can be configured and provides some info on how to connect to other GlobaLeaks users and experts.

This interface may help you understand how the Node is used by the whistleblower. It displays the submissions currently on the node and a few statistics on the kind of usage (activity, files, comments).
This interface permits to configure the: This interface permits to configure the email templates used for secure mail notifications.
This interface permits to configure the email templates used for unsecure mail notifications.
This interface shows the activity of the: This interface shows the activity of the users of your node. This may be helpful in detecting anomalies and supporting the Receivers of your node.
This interface shows you the unusual beh: Esta interface mostra-lhe o comportamento não usual que o sistema identificou.
This is a work-in-progress of the admini: This is a work-in-progress of the administration interface that you will see after logging onto the platform as an admin.
This is an e-mail notification to notify: This is an e-mail notification to notify you about new message from the whisleblower.
This is an e-mail notification to notify you that %CommentSource% has commented on a previous submission.
This is an e-mail notification to notify you that a whistleblower has selected you as a valuable recipient for his/her submission.
This is an e-mail notification to notify you that a whistleblower has updated a submission with new material.
This is an e-mail to inform you that you: This is an e-mail to inform you that your PGP key expired on %PGPExpirationDate%.
This is an e-mail to inform you that your PGP key will expire on %PGPExpirationDate%
This is dangerous and it's recommended i: This is dangerous and it's recommended instead to train receivers in the use of Tor and Enigmail.

This platform makes use of GlobaLeaks so: This platform makes use of GlobaLeaks software specifically designed to protect the identity of the submitter and of the receiver in the exchange of leaked materials.

To ensure your anonymity be sure that yo:
To ensure your anonymity be sure that you are visiting this site using the Tor Browser Bundle.
You acknowledge that failure to do so will result in the inability to technically protect your anonymity.
To further enhance your security, please follow these instructions:
1) In the event that you would like to remain anonymous, do not submit any personal information. (e.g. your name or relationship to the offender. Do not submit any information that can be traced back to you.)
2) Please do not submit your report on a PC provided by your employer. Particularly an intranet connection may jeopardize your anonymity.
To know more about GlobaLeaks Security y: To know more about GlobaLeaks Security you can read the following document:

We will try to get back to you as soon a: We will try to get back to you as soon as possible - to see any messages we send you or if you think of anything else you should have added, use the 16 digit number below to login and view any comments.

Whistleblowers can perform submissions v: Whistleblowers can perform submissions via Tor2web.
With a HTTPS submission you are exposing:
Com a submissão em HTTPS está a expor-se você mesmo aos riscos em que alguérm irá saber do que submeteu, sem saber que você o submeteu.

Em vez disso, com a Submissão Anónima está completamente protegido, não é possível para terceiros saberem que submeteu algo, nem o que submeteu.

We strongly advise you to go for an Anonymous Submission.

Para efetuar uma Submissão Anónima, em vez de utilizar o seu Navegador da Web normal (Internet Explorer, Chrome, Firefox, Opera, etc.), deverá utilizar o Tor Browser Bundle, isto é uma parte especial do programa criado para ativar a Navegação da Web Anónima.
Without a valid PGP key, the system will: Without a valid PGP key, the system will not be able to send you encrypted notifications.
You are aware of the risks involved. Go: Está ciente dos riscos envolvidos. Continue, mas considere-se avisado.
You are connecting to the node without a: You are connecting to the node without anonymity and this node supports only anonymous submissions
You are receiving this email because you: You are receiving this email because you should look into this to determine if the cause is malicious or not.
You are strongly advised to visit this s: You are strongly advised to visit this site using the desktop app called Tor Browser, that protects your identity.
You are strongly suggested to use the To: You are strongly suggested to use the Tor Browser, unless you know what you are doing.
You can reach GlobaLeaks's support chat: You can reach GlobaLeaks's support chat via IRC on OFTC server on channel #globaleaks:
You have finished configuring your Globa: You have finished configuring your GlobaLeaks site. You are now ready to future tweak it inside of the admin interface.
You have not configured your encryption: You have not configured your encryption keys, so the files will be stored on the GlobaLeaks node un-encrypted.
You should extend its validity and updat: You should extend its validity and update the key present on the GlobaLeaks nodes you are subscribed to or upload a new key.
